title: ID design / flourish / 'font' please
content:
Not exactly a type face but if you recognize this flourish, I sure would like to know what font to look for.  
Thanks!  
LinK

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [monogram-top.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=monogram-top.gif) | 474 bytes |
author: link

comments.content:
I think that is a symbol from the Illustrator CS symbols library, but I don’t have CS at home so I can’t check for you.  
Tim
What an ‘eye’ … Thanks! I have Illustrator9 … I’ll look into it. Thanks again :)

Unfortunately the ‘eye’ and the ‘mind’ has let me down (again) it isn’t the flourish I was thinking of, sorry. I have looked at some of my ornament fonts and couldn’t see it in those either.  
Tim
